Package com.jakewharton.android.actionbarsherlock

Interface Summary
ActionBarSherlock.DropDownHandler Interface which denotes a handler supports using a drop-down list for navigation.
ActionBarSherlock.HomeAsUpHandler Interface which denotes a handler supports setting the home action item as an "up" affordance.
ActionBarSherlock.LogoHandler Interface which denotes a third-party action bar handler implementation supports using the activity logo rather than just the home icon and a title.
ActionBarSherlock.MenuHandler Interface which denotes a third-party action bar handler implementation supports populating the action bar from an XML menu.
ActionBarSherlock.OnNavigationListener Listener interface for ActionBar navigation events.
 

Class Summary
ActionBarMenu An implementation of the android.view.Menu interface for use in inflating menu XML resources to be added to a third-party action bar.
ActionBarMenuItem An implementation of the android.view.MenuItem interface for use in inflating menu XML resources to be added to a third-party action bar.
ActionBarSherlock Helper for implementing the action bar design pattern across all versions of Android.
ActionBarSherlock.ActionBarHandler<T> Base class for handling an action bar that has been created by a ActionBarSherlock attachment.
ActionBarSherlock.Activity Special android.app.Activity wrapper which will allow for unifying common functionality via the ActionBarSherlock API.
ActionBarSherlock.FragmentActivity Special android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity wrapper which will allow for unifying common functionality via the ActionBarSherlock API.
ActionBarSherlock.ListActivity Deprecated. The use of Fragments and ListFragment is suggested for working with lists.
ActionBarSherlock.NativeActionBarHandler Minimal handler for Android's native android.app.ActionBar.
ActionBarSubMenu An implementation of the android.view.SubMenu interface for use in inflating menu XML resources to be added to a third-party action bar.
